TEXT.TITLE: WILSON FOODS <WILF> SHARE OFFERING STARTS
TEXT.BODY: Wilson Foods Corp said an offering of 2,500,000 common shares is underway at 10.375 dlrs each through underwriters led by <Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co Inc>. Reuter
